about_the_game:
Welcome to Capybara Hotel!
As a newly hired employee, your mission is to find the capybaras that are hidden around the hotel. Explore each area of the hotel in this hidden object game, using your observation skills to discover where the capybaras have hidden. With adorable graphics and easy-to-learn gameplay, this game is the perfect challenge for all ages. Completing your quest won't be easy, but with patience and attention to detail, you'll find every capybara in the Capybara Hotel!

Join this fun adventure today!

Features
  • Find the funny and cute capybaras that are hidden in a luxurious hotel

  • Explore all hidden areas to find capybara

  • Simple, intuitive design for an accessible gaming experience for all ages

  • Use your attention to detail to find the hidden capybara

  • Find all capybaras in each level to complete the quest

name: Capybara Hotel

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB display memory
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
